word.tr_en: to gather; to come together

phrase.ph: 【鳥：とり】が【集：あつ】まっている

sentence.s: 【明日：あした】 【集：あつ】まりましょう。
sentence.rom: Ashita atsumarimashō.
sentence.tr_en: Let's get together tomorrow.
sentence.tr_de: Lass uns morgen treffen.

sentence.s: みんなが【集：あつ】まったら、【仕：し】【事：ごと】を【始：はじ】めます。
sentence.rom: Minna ga atsumattara, shigoto o hajimemasu.
sentence.tr_en: We'll start as soon as everyone has gathered.
sentence.tr_de: Wir fangen an, sobald sich alle versammelt haben.

word.tr_en: to collect sth.; to gather sth.

sentence.s: 【私：わたし】は【外：がい】【国：こく】の【切：きっ】【手：て】も【集：あつ】めています。
sentence.rom: Watashi wa gaikoku no kitte mo atsumete imasu.
sentence.tr_en: I collect foreign stamps as well.
sentence.tr_de: Ich sammle auch ausländische Briefmarken.

sentence.s: ハルトは【短：みじか】い【時：じ】【間：かん】で【大：おお】【勢：ぜい】の【学：がく】【生：せい】を【集：あつ】められました。
sentence.rom: Haruto wa mijikai jikan de ōzei no gakusei o atsumeraremashita.
sentence.tr_en: Haruto was able to gather a large number of students in a short time.
sentence.tr_de: Haruto schaffte es, eine Menge an Schülern in kurzer Zeit zusammenzubringen.

sentence.s: このカフェは【若：わか】【者：もの】の【間：あいだ】で【人：にん】【気：き】を【集：あつ】めています。
sentence.rom: Kono kafe wa wakamono no aida de ninki o atsumete imasu.
sentence.tr_en: This café is gaining popularity among young people.
sentence.tr_de: Dieses Café gewinnt an Popularität unter jungen Leuten.

word.tr_en: to get crowded
word.rem: appears in 500mon q266 as 混む; appears in GENKI2 p.289 as 混んでいる

phrase.ph: 【混：こ】んでいるエレベーター
phrase.rem: jpod101 has 混んで, not 込んで

sentence.s: 【今：いま】、【食：しょく】【堂：どう】は【混：こ】んでいます。
sentence.rom: Ima, shokudō wa konde imasu.
sentence.tr_en: The cafeteria is crowded now.
sentence.tr_de: Die Cafeterie ist gerade überfüllt.
sentence.rem: 500mon has 混む, not 込む

sentence.s: 【午：ご】【後：ご】になると、【必：かなら】ずこの【道：みち】が【混：こ】む。
sentence.rom: Gogo ni naru to, kanarazu kono michi ga komu.
sentence.tr_en: The street always gets crowded in the afternoon.
sentence.tr_de: Die Strasse ist am Nachmittag immer überfüllt.
sentence.rem: verified with ChatGPT; ている is not required here

sentence.s: お【祭：まつ】りで【道：みち】がとても【混：こ】んでいました。
sentence.rom: O-matsuri de michi ga totemo konde imashita.
sentence.tr_en: Because of the festival, the streets were very crowded.
sentence.tr_de: Wegen dem Festival waren die Strassen total überfüllt.

word.tr_en: to be not crowded; to become empty; to thin out
word.tr_de: nicht überfüllt sein; leer werden; ausdünnen

sentence.s: 【今日：きょう】は【電：でん】【車：しゃ】が【空：す】いていた。
sentence.rom: Kyō wa densha ga suite ita.
sentence.tr_en: Today the train was quite empty.
sentence.tr_de: Heute war der Zug leer.

sentence.s: 【朝：あさ】【早：はや】い【時：じ】【間：かん】は【道：みち】が【空：す】いています。
sentence.rom: Asa hayai jikan wa michi ga suite imasu.
sentence.tr_en: The roads are empty in the early morning.
sentence.tr_de: Am frühen Morgen sind die Strassen leer.

word.tr_en: to tell; to express

phrase.ph: お【礼：れい】を【申：もう】し【上：あ】げる

sentence.s: 【心：こころ】からお【祝：いわ】いを【申：もう】し【上：あ】げます。
sentence.rom: Kokoro kara o-iwai o mōshiagemasu.
sentence.tr_en: I offer you my hearty congratulations.
sentence.tr_de: Ich gratuliere Ihnen von Herzen.

word.tr_en: to collapse; to crumble; to break down

phrase.tr_en: to collapse due to an earthquake

sentence.s: 【木：き】が【倒：たお】れている。
sentence.rom: Ki ga taorete iru.
sentence.tr_en: The tree has fallen over.
sentence.tr_de: Der Baum ist umgestürzt.

word.tr_en: to be caught; to be arrested; to hold on to sth.
word.tr_de: gefangen werden; verhaftet werden; an etw. festhalten
word.rem: appears in 500mon q312; jisho has n3

phrase.ph: 【警：けい】【察：さつ】に【捕：つか】まる
phrase.tr_en: to be arrested by the police

phrase.ph: 【枝：えだ】にしっかりつかまる
phrase.tr_en: to hold tightly to the branch
phrase.rem: verified with ChatGPT; usually in kana in this sense

sentence.s: 【泥：どろ】【棒：ぼう】が【捕：つか】まった。
sentence.rom: Dorobō ga tsukamatta.
sentence.tr_en: The thief was caught.
sentence.tr_de: Der Dieb ist gefangen worden.

word.tr_en: to catch; to arrest

sentence.s: 【警：けい】【察：さつ】は【泥：どろ】【棒：ぼう】を【捕：つか】まえた。
sentence.rom: Keisatsu wa dorobō o tsukamaeta.
sentence.tr_en: The police caught the thief.
sentence.tr_de: Die Polizei hat den Dieb geschnappt.

word.tr_en: to accompany; to be accompanied by
word.rem: appears in 500mon q185 and GENKI2 p.95 vocab section as 連れていく; jisho has nx

sentence.s: お【母：かあ】さん、【今：こん】【度：ど】 【海：うみ】に【連：つ】れていって。
sentence.rom: O-kāsan, kondo umi ni tsurete itte.
sentence.tr_en: Mom, take me to the ocean sometime.
sentence.tr_de: Mutti, nimm mich mal mit ans Meer.

word.tr_en: to be surprised; to be astonished

phrase.ph: 【驚：おどろ】くほど【多：おお】くの【人：ひと】
phrase.tr_en: a surprisingly large number of people

sentence.s: 【私：わたし】は【少：すこ】し【驚：おどろ】いた。
sentence.rom: Watashi wa sukoshi odoroita.
sentence.tr_en: I was a little surprised.
sentence.tr_de: Ich war ein wenig erstaunt.

sentence.s: 【別：べつ】に【驚：おどろ】くことじゃない。
sentence.rom: Betsu ni odoroku koto janai.
sentence.tr_en: It's not really something to be surprised about.
sentence.tr_de: Es ist nicht wirklich etwas erstaunliches.

word.tr_en: to let know; to inform

phrase.ph: 【両：りょう】【親：しん】に【知：し】らせる
【結：けっ】【婚：こん】【予：よ】【定：てい】を【知：し】らせる
phrase.tr_en: to inform about the marriage plans

sentence.s: 【祖：そ】【父：ふ】が【急：きゅう】に【死：し】んだという【知：し】らせがあった。
sentence.rom: Sofu ga kyū ni shinda to iu shirase ga atta.
sentence.tr_en: I got the news that my grandfather died suddenly.
sentence.tr_de: Ich habe die Nachricht bekommen, dass mein Grossvater plötzlich gestorben sei.
sentence.explanation_en: 「知らせ」is the noun of「知らせる」, which is the causative form of「知る」
sentence.explanation_de: 「知らせ」ist das Nomen von「知らせる」, welches die kausative Form von「知る」ist.

word.tr_en: to speak well of sb.; to praise sb.
word.tr_de: jem. loben; gut über jem. sprechen
word.rem: jisho has 褒 as the primary kanji, but Oxford p.48 uses 誉; appears in GENKI2 L21 vocab section as kana only

sentence.s: 【先：せん】【生：せい】に【褒：ほ】められて、とてもうれしかった。
sentence.rom: Sensei ni homerarete, totemo ureshikatta.
sentence.tr_en: My teacher complimented me, I was very happy.
sentence.tr_de: Mein Lehrer hat mir ein Kompliment gemacht, es hat mich froh gemacht.
sentence.explanation_en: 「ほめられる」is the passive form of「ほめる」
sentence.explanation_de: 「ほめられる」ist die passive Form von「ほめる」

sentence.s: 【先：せん】【生：せい】が【妹：いもうと】の【日：に】【本：ほん】【語：ご】を【褒：ほ】めてくれた。
sentence.rom: Sensei ga imōto no Nihon-go o homete kureta.
sentence.tr_en: The teacher praised my younger sister's Japanese.
sentence.tr_de: Der Lehrer hat meine jüngere Schwester wegen ihrem Japanisch gelobt.
sentence.explanation_en: The て-form of the verb is followed by くれる here, because the action is seen as beneficial to the people mentioned.
sentence.explanation_de: Auf die て-Form des Verbs folgt hier くれる, weil die Aktion als vorteilhaft für die erwähnten Leute empfunden wird.

word.tr_en: to look up (a word); to investigate sth.
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.73 vocab section

phrase.ph: 【倒：たお】れる【原：げん】【因：いん】を【調：しら】べる
phrase.tr_en: to investigate the cause of the collapse
phrase.tr_de: Nachforschungen zum Grund des Einsturzes anstellen

sentence.s: 【辞：じ】【書：しょ】でそれを【調：しら】べなさい。
sentence.rom: Jisho de sore o shirabe-nasai.
sentence.tr_en: Look it up in the dictionary.
sentence.tr_de: Schlage es im Wörterbuch nach.

sentence.s: 【漢：かん】【字：じ】の【意：い】【味：み】を【調：しら】べなさい。
sentence.rom: Kanji no imi o shirabe-nasai.
sentence.tr_en: Look up the meaning of the kanji.
sentence.tr_de: Schlage die Bedeutung des Kanjis nach.

word.tr_en: to put sth. in order; to tidy up (a room)
word.tr_de: etw. in Ordnung bringen; (einen Raum) aufräumen

phrase.ph: 【部：へ】【屋：や】を【片：かた】【付：づ】ける

sentence.s: 【部：へ】【屋：や】を【片：かた】【付：づ】けなさい。
sentence.rom: Heya o katadzuke-nasai.
sentence.tr_en: Tidy up your room.
sentence.tr_de: Räume dein Zimmer auf.

sentence.s: 【後：あと】で【台：だい】【所：どころ】を【片：かた】【付：づ】けます。
sentence.rom: Ato de daidokoro o katadzukemasu.
sentence.tr_en: I will clean up the kitchen later.
sentence.tr_de: Ich werde die Küche später aufräumen.

word.tr_en: to raise; to breed; to cultivate
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 L22 vocab section

sentence.s: 【池：いけ】【田：だ】さんは【馬：うま】を【育：そだ】てている。
sentence.rom: Ikeda-san wa uma o sodatete iru.
sentence.tr_en: Ms Ikeda raises a horse.
sentence.tr_de: Frau Ikeda zieht ein Pferd auf.

sentence.s: コナンはおじいさんに【育：そだ】てられた。
sentence.rom: Konan wa o-jīsan ni sodaterareta.
sentence.tr_en: Conan was raised by his grandfather.
sentence.tr_de: Conan wuchs bei seinem Grossvater auf.
sentence.explanation_en: 「育てられる」is the passive form of「育てる」
sentence.explanation_de: 「育てられる」ist die passive Form von「育てる」

word.tr_en: to make noise; to make merry; to make a fuss

phrase.ph: 【小：ちい】さな【問：もん】【題：だい】で【騒：さわ】ぐ
phrase.tr_en: to make a fuss over a small issue
phrase.tr_de: wegen einer kleiner Sache viel Aufhebens machen

sentence.s: そんなに【騒：さわ】いではいけません。
sentence.rom: Sonna ni sawaide wa ikemasen.
sentence.tr_en: Don't make so much noise!
sentence.tr_de: Mach nicht solch einen Krach!

word.tr_en: to commute; to travel back and forth

sentence.s: 【父：ちち】は【会：かい】【社：しゃ】に【電：でん】【車：しゃ】で【通：かよ】っている。
sentence.rom: Chichi wa kaisha ni densha de kayotte iru.
sentence.tr_en: My father commutes to his office by train.
sentence.tr_de: Mein Vater pendelt mit dem Zug an die Arbeit.

sentence.s: 【会：かい】【社：しゃ】まで【遠：とお】いので、【毎：まい】【日：にち】【電：でん】【車：しゃ】で【通：かよ】うのは【大：たい】【変：へん】です。
sentence.rom: Kaisha made tōi no de, mai-nichi densha de kayou no wa taihen desu.
sentence.tr_en: My office is far away, it's a hassle to commute to work by train every day.
sentence.tr_de: Mein Büro ist weit weg; es ist mühsam, jeden Tag mit dem Zug an die Arbeit zu pendeln.

word.tr_en: to pass through; to come through; to go through

sentence.s: この【道：みち】をまっすぐ【行：い】って、【神：じん】【社：じゃ】を【通：とお】ります。
sentence.rom: Kono michi o massugu itte, jinja o tōrimasu.
sentence.tr_en: Go straight along this road and you will pass by the shrine.
sentence.tr_de: Gehen Sie diese Strasse entlang, und Sie werden am Schrein vorbeikommen.

sentence.s: 【学：がっ】【校：こう】に【通：かよ】うときは、この【道：みち】を【通：とお】る。
sentence.rom: Gakkō ni kayou toki wa, kono michi o tōru.
sentence.tr_en: When I commute to school, I pass through this road.
sentence.tr_de: Wenn ich zur Schule pendle, komme ich durch diese Strasse.

sentence.s: 【池：いけ】【田：だ】さんの【声：こえ】は【通：とお】らない。
sentence.rom: Ikeda-san no koe wa tōranai.
sentence.tr_en: Ms Ikeda's voice doesn't come through (I can't hear her).
sentence.tr_de: Frau Ikedas Stimme kommt nicht durch (ich kann sie nicht hören).

sentence.s: このカーテンは【厚：あつ】くて、【光：ひかり】があまり【通：とお】らない。
sentence.rom: Kono kāten wa atsukute, hikari ga amari tōranai.
sentence.tr_en: These curtains are thick, so not much light passes through.
sentence.tr_de: Dieser Vorhang ist dick, es kommt nicht viel Licht durch.

word.tr_en: to die; to pass away

sentence.s: 【父：ちち】は【２：に】【年：ねん】【前：まえ】に【亡：な】くなった。
sentence.rom: Chichi wa ni-nen mae ni nakunatta.
sentence.tr_en: My father passed away two years ago.
sentence.tr_de: Mein Vater starb vor zwei Jahren.

word.tr_en: to increase (in quantity or number)

sentence.s: その【川：かわ】には【魚：さかな】が【増：ふ】えている。
sentence.rom: Sono kawa ni wa sakana ga fuete iru.
sentence.tr_en: The number of fish in that river is growing.
sentence.tr_de: Die Anzahl Fische in diesem Fluss nimmt zu.

sentence.s: 【車：くるま】を【持：も】たない【人：ひと】が【増：ふ】えていってるってテレビで【言：い】ってたよ。
sentence.rom: Kuruma o motanai hito ga fuete itteru tte terebi de itteta yo.
sentence.tr_en: I heard on TV that the amount of people who don't have a car is increasing.
sentence.tr_de: Am Fernsehen hat man gesagt, dass die Anzahl Leute, die kein Auto haben, zunimmt.

word.tr_en: to decrease (in quantity or number); to diminish
word.rem: appears in 500mon q163; jisho has n3

sentence.s: 【割：わり】【合：あい】が【減：へ】っている。
sentence.rom: Wariai ga hetteiru.
sentence.tr_en: The proportion is decreasing.
sentence.tr_de: Die Proportion ist am Abnehmen.

sentence.s: 【最：さい】【近：きん】、タバコを【吸：す】う【人：ひと】が【減：へ】りましたね。
sentence.rom: Saikin, tabako o suu hito ga herimashita ne.
sentence.tr_en: These days, there are fewer people who smoke (don't you think).
sentence.tr_de: In letzter Zeit gibt es weniger Leute, die rauchen (oder was meinst du).

word.tr_en: to be enough; to be sufficient

sentence.s: ちょっと【塩：しお】が【足：た】りないと【思：おも】うよ。
sentence.rom: Chotto shio ga tarinai to omou yo.
sentence.tr_en: I think there is not enough salt (in it).
sentence.tr_de: Ich denke, es hat etwas zu wenig Salz.

sentence.s: 【時：じ】【間：かん】が【足：た】りるのでちょっと【買：か】い【物：もの】に【行：い】ってきます。
sentence.rom: Jikan ga tariru no de chotto kaimono ni itte kimasu.
sentence.tr_en: Since there is enough time, I'll quickly go and buy something.
sentence.tr_de: Da ich noch genug Zeit habe, werde ich schnell was einkaufen gehen.

word.tr_en: to divide sth.; to split sth.; to crack sth.
word.rem: appears in 500mon q419; jisho has n3

sentence.s: すみません。あなたのカップを【割：わ】ってしまいました。
sentence.rom: Sumimasen. Anata no kappu o watte shimaimashita.
sentence.tr_en: I'm sorry. I broke your cup.
sentence.tr_de: Tut mir leid. Ich habe deine Tasse zerbrochen.

word.tr_en: to be split; it cracks

phrase.rem: verified with ChatGPT; also correct: 簡単に割れる kantan ni wareru

sentence.s: 【鏡：かがみ】が【割：わ】れている。
sentence.rom: Kagami ga warete iru.
sentence.tr_en: The mirror is broken.
sentence.tr_de: Der Spiegel ist zerbrochen.

sentence.s: このガラスは【割：わ】れにくくて【安：あん】【全：ぜん】です。
sentence.rom: Kono garasu wa ware-nikukute anzen desu.
sentence.tr_en: This glass is hard to break and therefore safe.
sentence.tr_de: Dieses Glas ist fast nicht zu zerbrechen und deshalb sicher.

word.tr_en: to be settled; to be completed; to get away with
word.tr_de: gelöst sein; erledigt sein; mit etwas davonkommen

phrase.tr_en: to get away with just a minor injury

sentence.s: その【問：もん】【題：だい】がもう【済：す】んでいる。
sentence.rom: Sono mondai ga mō sunde iru.
sentence.tr_en: That problem has already been solved.
sentence.tr_de: Dieses Problem ist bereits gelöst.

sentence.s: 【電：でん】【話：わ】で【済：す】まそうと【思：おも】いました。
sentence.rom: Denwa de sumasō to omoimashita.
sentence.tr_en: I thought I could settle it by phone.
sentence.tr_de: Ich dachte, ich könnte es per Telefon lösen.

sentence.s: 【済：す】んだことをいつまでも【気：き】にするな。
sentence.rom: Sunda koto o itsu made mo ki ni suru na.
sentence.tr_en: Don’t keep worrying about what’s already done.
sentence.tr_de: Höre auf, dir Sorgen zu machen über etwas, das längst erledigt ist.

sentence.s: 【謝：あやま】って【済：す】めばいいけどね···
sentence.rom: Ayamatte sumeba ii kedo ne…
sentence.tr_en: It’d be nice if just apologising were enough…
sentence.tr_de: Es wäre schön, wenn eine Entschuldigung ausreichen würde…

word.tr_en: to remain; to be left

phrase.tr_en: to remain in one's heart; to be unforgettable

sentence.s: 【僕：ぼく】はイギリスに【帰：かえ】って、【彼：かの】【女：じょ】はフランスに【残：のこ】った。
sentence.rom: Boku wa Igirisu ni kaette, kanojo wa Furansu ni nokotta.
sentence.tr_en: I returned to England, (but) my girlfriend stayed in France.
sentence.tr_de: Ich ging nach England zurück, (aber) meine Freundin blieb in Frankreich.
sentence.rem: jisho has nx for Igirisu, Furansu

sentence.s: そして、【三：さん】【人：にん】が【残：のこ】った。
sentence.rom: Soshite, san-nin ga nokotta.
sentence.tr_en: And then there were only three.
sentence.tr_de: Und dann waren es nur noch drei.

word.tr_en: to sway; it shakes

sentence.s: 【木：き】は【風：かぜ】で【揺：ゆ】れている。
sentence.rom: Ki wa kaze de yurete iru.
sentence.tr_en: The tree is swaying in the wind.
sentence.tr_de: Der Baum schwankt im Wind.

sentence.s: 【家：いえ】は【地：じ】【震：しん】で【揺：ゆ】れていた。
sentence.rom: Ie wa jishin de yurete ita.
sentence.tr_en: The house was shaking due to the earthquake.
sentence.tr_de: Das Haus bebte vom Erdbeben.

word.tr_en: to be in time
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 L22 vocab section

phrase.ph: 【間：ま】に【合：あ】うように【急：いそ】ぐ
phrase.rom: ma ni au yō ni isogu
phrase.tr_en: to hurry in order to be on time
phrase.tr_de: sich beeilen, um rechtzeitig zu kommen

phrase.ph: 【最：さい】【後：ご】のバスに【間：ま】に【合：あ】う
phrase.tr_en: to be in time for the last bus

sentence.s: 【行：い】かなきゃ【間：ま】に【合：あ】わない。
sentence.rom: Ikanakya ma ni awanai.
sentence.tr_en: I must go or I'll be late.
sentence.tr_de: Ich muss gehen, sonst komm ich zu spät.
sentence.explanation_en: 「行かなきゃ」＝「行かなければならない」

sentence.s: 【早：はや】く【行：い】ったのに【間：ま】に【合：あ】わなかった。
sentence.rom: Hayaku itta no ni ma ni awanakatta.
sentence.tr_en: In spite of going early, I wasn't in time.
sentence.tr_de: Obwohl ich früh gegangen bin, war ich nicht rechtzeitig.

sentence.s: 【走：はし】ったら、【８：はち】【時：じ】のバスに【間：ま】に【合：あ】うかもしれない。
sentence.rom: Hashittara, hachi-ji no basu ni ma ni au kamoshirenai.
sentence.tr_en: If you run, you might make it in time for the 8:00 bus.
sentence.tr_de: Wenn du rennst, schaffst du es vielleicht noch rechtzeitig auf den 8 Uhr Bus.
sentence.rem: jisho has n5 for ka, mo, shirenai, but n3 for kamoshirenai...

word.tr_en: to bring down; to let down
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.72 vocab section; jisho has n3

sentence.s: 【中：なか】【川：がわ】さんは【棚：たな】から【本：ほん】を【下：お】ろした。
sentence.rom: Nakagawa-san wa tana kara hon o oroshita.
sentence.tr_en: Ms Nakagawa got the book down from the shelf.
sentence.tr_de: Frau Nakagawa holte das Buch vom Regal herunter.

word.tr_en: to fold sth.; to break sth. off; to fracture
word.tr_de: etw. falten; etw. zerbrechen; etw. abbrechen

sentence.s: 【木：き】から【枝：えだ】を【折：お】った。
sentence.rom: Ki kara eda o otta.
sentence.tr_en: I broke a branch off the tree.
sentence.tr_de: Ich habe vom Baum einen Ast abgebrochen.

word.tr_en: to snap; to be broken; to be folded

sentence.s: 【折：お】れた【枝：えだ】がたくさんある。
sentence.rom: Oreta eda ga takusan aru.
sentence.tr_en: There are many broken branches.
sentence.tr_de: Es hat viele angebrochene Zweige.

sentence.s: 【歯：は】が【折：お】れてしまいました。
sentence.rom: Ha ga orete shimaimashita.
sentence.tr_en: The tooth broke off.
sentence.tr_de: Der Zahn ist abgebrochen.

word.tr_en: to clap; to knock; to pat
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.81 with kana alone; jisho has n3 for word and nx for kanji

sentence.s: みんなで【手：て】をたたこう。
sentence.rom: Minna de te o tatakō.
sentence.tr_en: Let's all clap our hands together.
sentence.tr_de: Lasst uns alle in die Hände klatschen.

word.tr_en: to apologise

sentence.s: あなたが【悪：わる】くなくても、【謝：あやま】ってくれませんか。
sentence.rom: Anata ga warukunakute mo, ayamatte kuremasen ka?
sentence.tr_en: Even if you're not in the wrong, could you not say you're sorry?
sentence.tr_de: Auch wenn du nicht unrecht hast, könntest du dich nicht (wenigstens) entschuldigen?

sentence.s: それは【謝：あやま】って【済：す】む【問：もん】【題：だい】じゃないよ。
sentence.rom: Sore wa ayamatte sumu mondai janai yo.
sentence.tr_en: That's not a problem that can be resolved just by apologising.
sentence.tr_de: Das ist nicht ein Problem, das man einfach mit sich entschuldigen gelöst werden kann.

word.tr_en: to suit (you); to look good (on you)
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.49 vocab section; jisho has n3

sentence.s: そのズボンが【似：に】【合：あ】わないと【思：おも】う。
sentence.rom: Sono zubon ga niawanai to omou.
sentence.tr_en: I think those trousers do not look good on you.
sentence.tr_de: Ich finde, dass diese Hosen dir nicht stehen.

word.tr_en: to duplicate; to copy; to imitate
word.tr_de: etw. abschreiben; etw. kopieren; etw. imitieren

phrase.ph: 【文：ぶん】【章：しょう】を【写：うつ】す

sentence.s: 【宿：しゅく】【題：だい】はこの【漢：かん】【字：じ】を【写：うつ】しなさい。
sentence.rom: Shukudai wa kono kanji o utsushinasai.
sentence.tr_en: For homework, copy these kanji characters.
sentence.tr_de: Schreibt diese Kanjizeichen ab als Hausaufgabe.

word.tr_en: to wake up; to regain consciousness
word.rem: appears in 500mon q157; jisho has n3

sentence.s: 【夜：よ】【中：なか】に【何：なん】【度：ど】も【目：め】が【覚：さ】めました。
sentence.rom: Yonaka ni nando mo me ga samemashita.
sentence.tr_en: I woke up several times during the night.
sentence.tr_de: Ich bin in der Nacht mehrmals aufgewacht.
sentence.rem: jisho has n3 for yonaka and n3 for sameru

word.tr_en: to pollute; to make dirty
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.139 vocab section; jisho has n2

sentence.s: 【新：あたら】しい【着：き】【物：もの】を【汚：よご】してしまいました。
sentence.rom: Atarashii kimono o yogoshite shimaimashita.
sentence.tr_en: I accidentally got the new kimono dirty.
sentence.tr_de: Ich habe leider meinen neuen Kimono verdreckt.

word.tr_en: to become dirty

sentence.s: 【汚：よご】れた【服：ふく】を【洗：あら】ってください。
sentence.rom: Yogoreta fuku o aratte kudasai.
sentence.tr_en: Please wash the dirty clothes.
sentence.tr_de: Bitte waschen Sie die dreckigen Kleider.

word.tr_en: to invite so.; to take so. along
word.rem: appears in GENKI2 p.73, p.80; jisho has n3

phrase.ph: 【隣：となり】の【人：ひと】たちをパーティーに【誘：さそ】う
phrase.rom: tonari no hito-tachi o pātī ni sasou
phrase.tr_en: to invite the neighbours to the party

sentence.s: パーティーに【誘：さそ】ってもらったけど、【行：い】かない。
sentence.rom: Pātī ni sasotte moratta kedo, ikanai.
sentence.tr_en: I was invited to the party, but I'm not going.
sentence.tr_de: Ich bin zwar zur Party eingeladen, aber ich werde nicht hingehen.

sentence.s: せっかく【誘：さそ】ってくれたのに、ごめん、【行：い】けない。
sentence.rom: Sekkaku sasotte kureta no ni, gomen, ikenai.
sentence.tr_en: You took the trouble to invite me, but I’m sorry, I can’t go.
sentence.tr_de: Du hast dir die Mühe gemacht, mich einzuladen, aber ich kann leider nicht kommen.

word.tr_en: to meet; to approach; to welcome
word.tr_de: jem. treffen; sich nähern; jem. Willkommen heissen

phrase.tr_en: to go to pick sb. up

phrase.ph: お【客：きゃく】【様：さま】を【迎：むか】える

sentence.s: 【一：いち】【時：じ】【間：かん】【後：あと】にナオミを【空：くう】【港：こう】へ【迎：むか】えに【行：い】く。
sentence.rom: Ichi-ji-kan ato ni Naomi o kūkō e mukae ni iku.
sentence.tr_en: I will go to the airport to pick up Naomi in an hour.
sentence.tr_de: Ich werde in einer Stunde Naomi am Flughafen abholen gehen.
